role.description: The current role of the alumni - If the alumni is not active, this will be the last role

company.description: The current company of the alumni

location.description: The current location of the alumni

label.description: The label of the data point

value.description: The value of the data point

count.description: The number of alumni in the company

companyCount.description: The total number of companies in the database, regardless of filters

companyFilteredCount.description: The total number of companies in the database, after applying the filters

alumniCount.description: The total number of alumni in the database

alumniFilteredCount.description: The total number of alumni with roles in the database, after applying the filters

endDate.description: The role end date, if applicable

count.description: The number of alumni in the country

linkedinUrl.description: The linkedin url of the company

foundedByAlumni.description: Was the company founded by an alumni

founded.description: The founded year of the company

similarCompanies.description: The similar companies of the company, whether by industry, # of employees, etc.

averageYOE.description: The average YOE of the current employees

averageYOC.description: The average length of employment in company

alumni.description: The past alumni of the company

countries.description: The countries where alumni that work for the company are located

cities.description: The cities where alumni that work for the company are located

averageTrend.description: The average trend of the company

industryTrend.description: The trend of companies in the same industry

trend.description: The alumni count trend of the country

filteredCount.description: The total number of countries in the database before applying the filters

count.description: The number of alumni in the city

trend.description: The alumni count trend of the city

id.description: The unique ID of the city

count.description: The number of alumni working in the industry

trend.description: The alumni trend of the industry

count.description: The total number of industries in the database

filteredCount.description: The total number of industries in the database before applying the filters

level.description: The level of classification of the role, 1 being a more general role and 2 being a more specific role

code.description: The ESCO code of the role
